text: If you missed it, I wrote a blog on some HubL trickery <https://medium.com/@eddyvinck/how-to-access-custom-module-properties-in-the-global-scope-of-HubSpot-html-email-templates-f403ab24448d>

*Do you mind if I link out to your post with a paraphrased intro?* ( I have a website not yet launched that the visitors of would really like your article. it will be fully attributed to you and I won’t copy any of your content, so no duplicate content seo problems
Sure, if it's just a paraphrased intro, no problem! Let me know when you launch the website :smile:

Will do, may be a little bit been working on it in my off hours but it’s coming along pretty nicely.

and yea it’ll just be a short paraphrased intro to tell people what your article is about, without going into any real details. Kinda like how it’s done on CSS Tricks: <https://spin.d.pr/DPoou2+>
Nice! I look forward to seeing the website when you launch it.

Hi! I'm trying to create a related blog post section inside a blog-post-template; but I can't get it right. The tag is also showing post from oterh blog-ids :confused: Anyone now what I'm doing wrong? Thanks! (#HubSpotnewbee)
Does HubSpot have a site_url variable?
